statements: SELECT * FROM EmployeeShifts WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT shift_date, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM EmployeeShifts WHERE shift_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeShifts WHERE shift_start_time < '10:00:00' AND dish_served = 'Spaghetti';
SELECT employee_id, shift_date, dish_served FROM EmployeeShifts ORDER BY shift_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT dish_served FROM EmployeeShifts WHERE shift_date BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-30';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeShifts WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT shift_date, shift_start_time FROM EmployeeShifts WHERE shift_end_time > '12:00:00';
SELECT DISTINCT dish_served FROM EmployeeShifts ORDER BY shift_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, shift_start_time, shift_end_time, dish_served FROM EmployeeShifts WHERE shift_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS total_shifts FROM EmployeeShifts GROUP BY employee_id ORDER BY total_shifts DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, position FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_id, name, start_date FROM employees ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM shifts WHERE shift_date = '2022-10-20';
SELECT employee_id, name, shift_date, start_time, end_time FROM shifts JOIN employees ON shifts.employee_id = employees.employee_id ORDER BY shift_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_id, name, position FROM employees ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT name, position, shift_date FROM employees JOIN shifts ON employees.employee_id = shifts.employee_id WHERE shift_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT employee_id, name, start_time, end_time FROM employees JOIN shifts ON employees.employee_id = shifts.employee_id WHERE start_time > '08:00:00' AND end_time < '17:00:00';
SELECT employee_id, name, position, shift_date FROM employees LEFT JOIN shifts ON employees.employee_id = shifts.employee_id WHERE shift_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT name, hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT dish_name, price FROM global_dishes WHERE cuisine_type = 'Italian' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT employee_id, name, position FROM employees WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT schedule_id, shift_start, shift_end FROM employee_schedule WHERE employee_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT name, position FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM global_dishes WHERE cuisine_type = 'Italian' AND price > 20 ORDER BY dish_name ASC;

SELECT e.name, es.shift_start, es.shift_end FROM employees e JOIN employee_schedule es ON e.employee_id = es.employee_id WHERE es.shift_start >= '2022-01-01 08:00:00' AND es.shift_end <= '2022-01-01 16:00:00';

SELECT e.name, COUNT(es.schedule_id) AS total_shifts FROM employees e LEFT JOIN employee_schedule es ON e.employee_id = es.employee_id GROUP BY e.name HAVING total_shifts > 5 ORDER BY total_shifts DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE employee_position='Manager';
SELECT dish_name, cuisine_type, price FROM dishes ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, dish_id, quantity FROM orders WHERE order_date='2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM shifts WHERE shift_date='2022-01-20' AND start_time < '12:00:00';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_position = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE hire_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT dish_name, price FROM dishes WHERE cuisine_type = 'Italian' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT employee_name, shift_date, start_time, end_time FROM employees INNER JOIN shifts ON employees.employee_id = shifts.supervisor_id;

SELECT employee_name, dish_name, order_date, quantity FROM employees INNER JOIN orders ON employees.employee_id = orders.employee_id INNER JOIN dishes ON orders.dish_id = dishes.dish_id WHERE employees.employee_position = 'Chef';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, role FROM employees WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT dish_name, cuisine_type, price FROM dishes WHERE cuisine_type = 'Italian';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, role, hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT reservation_id, reservation_date, table_number FROM reservations ORDER BY reservation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE role = 'Manager'
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC
SELECT dish_name, cuisine_type, price FROM dishes WHERE cuisine_type = 'Italian' ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT reservation_date, table_number FROM reservations JOIN shifts ON reservations.shift_id = shifts.shift_id WHERE shift_date = '2022-10-15'
SELECT employee_name, role, hire_date FROM employees JOIN shifts ON employees.employee_id = shifts.employee_id WHERE start_time < '12:00'
